name: Survival Frenzy
description:
Game Play description

Survival frenzy is action battle royal game played by 20 people.

Five keys, five guns, one helicopter.

Who's got the key,
Who's got a gun,
We don't know.

When you get a gun, it's very advantageous in battle.
However, don't relax even if you own a gun.
Someone is waiting around you to take the gun.

There are also a variety of tools needed for combat.
Take the enemy with a Melee weapon or throw the acquired tools to destroy the enemy.

Action Combat, keys and guns, is just a process to survive.
The important goal is to survive the last time, or to escape in a helicopter.

Key features
Items
- Acquire daily supplies and use them as survival tools.

Guns
- Guns will be appear one at a time.

Escape
- Win by getting on to the helicopter in the end.
